channel.title: 路透财经

item.title: 观看：全球最大的视频游戏公司腾讯控股第四季度营收增长7%，低于预期，原因是游戏收入萎缩，该公司还表示，预计今年的股票回购将至少增加一倍。
item.description:
WATCH: The world's largest video game company, Tencent Holdings, posted a weaker-than-expected 7% rise in fourth-quarter revenue as its gaming revenue shrank, and said it was expecting to at least double its share buybacks this year https://t.co/ZkTMsEAJWO pic.twitter.com/HHceu8oM2x

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 观看：波音公司表示，在美国飞机制造商危机不断恶化的情况下，该公司将限制737飞机的生产以提高质量，因此第一季度的现金消耗量将超过之前的预期，并将公司的现金流目标推后。
item.description:
WATCH: Boeing said it would burn more cash in the first quarter than previously expected and pushed back a company cash-flow goal as it constrains 737 production to improve quality amid a worsening crisis at the US planemaker https://t.co/3LKzYGnuQJ pic.twitter.com/XeIleeUADe

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024

item.title: 英国通胀率在 2 月份有所放缓，这使得英格兰银行有望在未来几个月内开始降息，并在预计今年晚些时候举行的大选之前为首相苏纳克提供了一些更好的经济消息
item.description:
British inflation slowed in February, keeping the Bank of England on track to start cutting interest rates in the months ahead and offering some better economic news to Prime Minister Rishi Sunak before an election expected later this year https://t.co/gyUCae1CPJ pic.twitter.com/hWbmMlX3Lw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 20, 2024
